title: 33 Preseason Questions — Steelers B’s Buzz, Gronks at Every Position, and Green Bay’s Bargain (Ep. 127)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark continue their 33 Preseason Questions leading up to opening day, including why Big Ben could be in for his biggest season (3:30), and how a healthy Honey Badger will have the Cards flying high (7:25). Then, the guys fantasize about a trade that could make the Jaguars a playoff contender (11:30), having a beer with Blake Bortles (20:50), and which player could play the most positions in an NFL game (23:50). Finally, Robert and Kevin discuss how the Falcons and Packers stole some key pieces for their playoff chases (35:20).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
